name: London For Men
description:
London For Men/ Approx. 4 oz.
Veg. Glycerin Soap 
With Extra-Virgin Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Black Clay, Tea Tree E.O and Men's fragrance.
Extra-Virgin Olive Oil benefits: whether applied to face or body, Olive oil, will penetrate deep into the skin and provide a long lasting shield of moisture to keep it smooth and supple.
Jojoba Oi Uses (some)l: Anti-bacterial, Anti-inflammatory, Anti-acne and Moisturizer. 
Tea tree Oil: Anti-bacterial, Reduce Pain associated with the swelling of arthritis, athletes foot, blisters, acne, etc., 
Black Clay: It has the ability to absorb and remove toxins, heavy metals, impurities and chemicals from the skin.

name: Chocolate Mousse and Coconut
description:
Chocolate Mousse and Coconut Scent/ Approx 4 oz.
Vegan Vegetable Glycerin Soap. 
This is an almost edible soap, with Extra Virgin Coconut Oil and Sweet Coconut Cream.
Coconut Oil provides deep and real moisture, it helps Strengthen underlying tissues and to remove excessive dead cells on the skin's surface that makes your skin rough and flaky in texture.

name: Hymalayan Salt
description:
Hymalayan Salt/ Approx 5.5 oz.
Veg. Glycerin Soap
Hymalayan Salts are also known as King Salts, because they were only for royalty members. 
They are knowing to cleanse and detoxify the skin, leaving it smoother, softer and cleaner than ever before.They are also known for their healing properties, they are an effective treatment for common skin conditions such as dry skin, psoriasis, and acne, Salts can be use to soothe insect bites, heal blisters and even treat ailments that affect our joints such and arthritis. 
Coconut Oil is better than the average facial moisturizers. 
Patchouli EO: a Rich Earthy and Ground Fragrance that can act like an aphrodisiac, it is helpful for most all skin types, ranging from dry cracked skin all the way to helping to regulate oily skin and acne, Those with eczema, psoriasis and dandruff have said that patchouli is specially helpful for them. Emotionally, Patchouli is calming and grounding, Spiritually, It has been used alone during praying or meditation, Our blend is with Grapefruit (pink) EO.

name: Frankincense & Mandarin Myrrh
description:
Frankincense & Mandarin Myrrh/ Approx. 4 oz.
Vegetable Glycerin Soap
No colorants Added.
Mandarin orange, Lemon Meyer and Tangerine Zest tangle with the freshness of sweet clove Bud, Basil and star Jazmine
Fragrance with 
Frankincense Essential Oil: The ancient Egyptians used it in rejuvenation face masks. It is also a valuable product in skin care products for aging and dry skin.
Tumeric benefits (some of them) are: Anti-inflammatory, Anti-bacterial, Anti-aging properties,etc.

name: Green Tea
description:
Green Tea / Approx 4 oz.
Vegetable Glycerin Soap 
Extra-Virgin Olive Oil: Gives to your skin a long lasting shield to keep your skin hydrated and smooth.
Green Tea: contains a great deal of Anti-oxidants, which are effective against free radicals. These free radical which are formed when the skin is exposed to the UV rays of the sun, are accountable for premature aging. 
This wondrous natural component is also responsible for the cell renewal process. It is also known for combating skin cancer by blocking the cancer causing harmful enzyme.

name: Orange & Clove
description: Orange & Clove soap is a favorite among people who loves spicy soaps. Made in small, controlled batches our natural orange and clove soap is completely handmade, hand-cut and hand-wrapped. Clove E.O. is a natural insect repellent as well as having anti-viral and anti-fungal properties. Bursting with bits of exfoliating orange peel, with added vegetable glycerin, Shea butter, cosmetic grade colorant and fragrance oil. You'll get plenty of moisture with all that orange and clove zest.

name: Hugo Boss Fragrance
description: Jojoba Oil, and Active charcoal in a Vegetable glycerin base. You are going to love it.

name: White Magnolia
description: Vegetable glycerin, cornstarch (a natural mild exfoliant) and Vitamin E (a great antioxidant), FDA Approved colorant. Delicious scented bar that helps your skin retain moisture.

name: NATURAL ALOE VERA AND HONEY SOAP
description:
THE FRESH ALOE VERA HAS THE ABILITY TO WORK ON DIFFERENT SPECIFIC PROBLEMS EACH PERSON MAY HAVE, IS A NATURAL ASTRINGENT, EMOLLIENT, ANTIFUNGAL, AND CELL PROLIFERANT ( QUICKLY REGROWS NEW CELLS) USED TO HEAL WOUNDS AND BURNS. 
SOME OF THE RAW HONEY BENEFITS ARE: THE ABILITY TO ABSORB AND RETAIN MOISTURIZE, ANTIOXIDANT AND ANTIMICROBIAL PROPERTIES. WITH COCONUT OIL, AND LEMONGRASS-MINT FRESH SCENT. (GLYCERIN SOAP)

name: Honey & OatMeal
description: Honey, oat meal, goat's milk and vegetable glycerin. Good for sensitive skin, eczema, babies, and some conditions related to dryness. Our best seller for the winter season!

name: Yuzu Scent (Japanese Pomegranate)
description:
Vegetable Glycerin Soap.
Coconut, Palm, Olive and Castor Oils are the main ingredients on this wonderful soap, We also add Shea Butter to keep your skin smooth and hydrated.
